column5: Welcome to our cozy and quiet town home in Grand Prairie, TX! Located right across the street from a wonderful golf course, if that's your bag. The perfect place for anyone looking to explore/visit the DFW metroplex. Our place is just 3 minutes from I-20 and 10 to I-30. Borders Arlington (Six Flags, Hurricane Harbor, Ranger Stadium, Cowboys Stadium). Set in the middle of Dallas and Fort Worth, perfect for visiting both! Enjoy a relaxing stay in your huge room with your own bathroom.
